basics.name: Ferenc Gozony
basics.label: Game Art Designer
basics.summary: Artist and author, looking to push the bounds of what's been done.

work.name: SECO-LARM, USA.
work.summary: Using Adobe Creative Suite and ConstantContact, I worked with the Senior Graphic Designer and a sister company in Taiwan to produce and distribute marketing materials including social media posts, website banners, email banners, email advertisements, and product literature (manuals, mounting templates, product information sheets, etc.).

work.name: Restaurant Industry
work.summary: Worked 2 jobs as an 'Essential worker' during the pandemic. The first was at 'Benjies NY Deli' in Santa Ana, CA, where I worked as a Dishwasher during the summer of my Junior year. Then I began to search for a higher paying position and landed a job as a Barista at 'King Coffee, Inc.' in Anaheim, CA. Here I learned to provide good customer service and meet restaurant cleanliness standards. However, I left several months later in pursuit of a job that was more geared towards the Computer Science industry.

education.area: Donald Bren School of Information and Computer Sciences (ICS)
education.studyType: B.S in Game Design and Interactive Media

references.name: James Hollifield
references.reference: Senior Graphic Designer for SECO-LARM, USA, whom I worked with for a year.
